adrFormatAddress: 1020 Park Avenue @, E 85th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

originalText.text:
It feels they just want to regularly take the payment from the insurance, as they want you to come Two times a week.
No prep for the  body and minimal adjustments.

Terrible service, the receptionist and nurse seem to have an attitude problem.

Third time I went  I waited for 45min and did not receive care, other people would be attended before me, when I had an appointment and arrived early out of courtesy.

I will never come back
Save your time and go with someone that loves what they do and help you heal.
This is not that place.

originalText.text: Dr. Gold is an excellent chiropractor and has been a huge support throughout my pregnancy.  The care that I have received has kept back pain at a minimum over the past 8 months and helped keep my spine in alignment.  I recently moved to Westchester but still come to the city to see Dr. Gold because I've had such a positive experience.  Scheduling appointments is easy and his office staff is kind and knowledgeable.

originalText.text:
The treatment I received here made my back pain far worse, with little to no explanation from the doctor other than to continue to do the very things which were making things worse. My pain nearly vanished days after I stopped visiting after weeks of worsening symptoms.

Upon visiting a certified back surgeon, I was informed the diagnoses and treatment I received from this chiropractor were incorrect.

originalText.text: Went for some back pain. Dr. Gold and Dr.Merai were very understanding and compassionate. I like the fact that they were able to address all my concerns being this was my first time at a chiropractor's office. The staff was pleasant as well. I would definitely recommend this office!!

text.text: Went for some back pain. Dr. Gold and Dr.Merai were very understanding and compassionate. I like the fact that they were able to address all my concerns being this was my first time at a chiropractor's office. The staff was pleasant as well. I would definitely recommend this office!!

originalText.text: I’m so happy that I decided to see a chiropractor only because I had to google my symptoms! .. i’ve been given muscle relaxant prescriptions by my pcp and at urgent care that only make me sleepy , had injections for pain, been referred to physical therapy for exercise but never have I been referred to get xrays to find the root of my problem! I can’t wait for my follow up to take the next step to get my back aligned . I was even told at urgent care with another doctor that I had to lose weight and that there’s no such thing as hereditary back pain ! I know I need to exercise but I have been having back problems for years and my dad’s side of the family all suffer from back pain . Once I even lost feeling in my legs and had to drag myself back to bed.  Thanks to Dr. Cory Gold I feel like I can get better and no longer have to go through temporary fixes . I’m so surprised that I wasn’t referred to a chiropractor before but now I feel like I’ve found a great solution !
